css_value: body.maxi-blocks--active #column-maxi-639348fd-u{box-shadow:0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(var(--maxi-dark-color-8,9,60,88),1);width:calc(33.33% - 0px);flex-basis:calc(33.33% - 0px);min-width:initial;flex-direction:column;}@media only screen and (max-width:767px){body.maxi-blocks--active #column-maxi-639348fd-u{margin-right:auto;margin-left:auto;width:100%;flex-basis:100%;order:4;}}@media only screen and (max-width:480px){body.maxi-blocks--active #column-maxi-639348fd-u{order:3;}}
